Graveknights are undead warriors granted unlife by a cursed suit of armor. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 27 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 [Graveknight](/Monsters.aspx?ID=244) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 191 **Perception** +19; darkvision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +20 **Str** +7 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +5 **Items** [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +19 **Will** +18 **HP** 175 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** cold, death, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious **Sacrilegious Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64)) 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it, with a +17 counteract modifier.
**Attack of Opportunity** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _frost greatsword_ +24 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d12+10 slashing plus 1d6 cold **Melee** fist +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)), **Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold **Ranged** _frost composite longbow_ +21 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Creatures in the area take 6d12 cold damage (DC 29 basic Reflex save). The graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Graveknight's Curse** This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight’s armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 33 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** doomed 1 and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor’s graveknight. **Phantom Mount** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)) The graveknight summons a supernatural mount as per [_phantom steed_](/Spells.aspx?ID=221), heightened to a level equal to half the graveknight's level. Unlike _phantom steed_, the steed's AC and saving throw bonuses are all 4 lower than the graveknight's, and the steed has one-third the graveknight's Hit Points (rounded down). If the steed is destroyed, the graveknight must wait 1 hour before using this ability again.
HP 58; AC 27, Fort +17, Ref +15, Will +14. **Weapon Master** The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.
